textAfterTable: Men's Footwear UK Size 7 7.8 8 8.5 9 9.5 10 10.5 11 11.5 12 12.5 13 European Size 41 42 42.5 43 44 44.5 45 45.5 46 47 47.5 48 48.5 Womenswear Size XS S M L XL UK 6/8 8/10 10/12 14/16 16/18 Germany 32/34 34/36 38/40 40/42 44/46 France 34/36 38/40 40/42 44/46 46/48 Italy 38/40 40/42 44/46 46/48 48/50 Height 158 163 168 173 178 Women's Footwear UK Size 5 5.5 6 6.5 7 7.5 8 8.5 European Size 38.5 39 40 40.5 41 42 42.4 43 Description The Nike Men's Printed Miler Short Sleeve T-Shirt in turbo green is made from Dri-FIT fabric which will wick sweat away from your body to keep you feeling dry and comfortable, whilst the ergonomic, flat seams will reduce irritation and promote a natural range of motion. Adorned with an all-over geometric print, the tee also has a reflective loop at the upper back which will keep media player cables out of the way. - L.M.
